H0.text: In 2006, who became the second basketball player to score over 80 points in an NBA game. Kobe Bryant's teammate, Lamar Odom

H1.text: In 2006, who became the second basketball player to score over 80 points in an NBA game. Allen Iverson

H2.text: In 2006, who became the second basketball player to score over 80 points in an NBA game. Tracy McGrady

H3.text: In 2006, who became the second basketball player to score over 80 points in an NBA game. KB24

A4.text: Kobe Bryant scored 81 points in an NBA game on January 22, 2006, which was the second-highest point total in NBA history at the time, surpassed only by Wilt Chamberlain's 100-point game in 1962.
